description:

title: Marvel Confirms Death Of MCU Character

description:
Stephen King is already well-known for written some of the greatest modern-day novels and short stories, in addition to having inspired similarly great modern-day films and shows as a result. In more recent years, however, Stephen King has also become known for his recommendations – and now King is recommending the #1 thriller on Netflix [...]

The post Stephen King Praises Top Thriller Movie On Netflix As “One Of The Best” appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Stephen King Praises Top Thriller Movie On Netflix As “One Of The Best”

description:
Ryan Murphy is heavily involved with the Netflix series Monster, most recently titled Monsters: The Lyle and Erik Menendez Story for its latest season, having both created the show and written several of its episodes. Now Ryan Murphy is stepping forward to defend Monsters – especially now that Erik Menendez has stepped forward to call [...]

title: Ryan Murphy Defends His Netflix Series ‘Monsters’
